scenes.narration:
The SENATE is filled with chatter. mrcsschssr, wearing his imperial toga, stands before them, looking defiant. SENATOR rises.
'SENATOR: The SANO has spoken! You are no longer Emperor.'
mrcsschssr is escorted out, bewildered.
'NARRATOR: Well, this is humiliating. Couldn't they at least have the decency to kill me like Cesar?'
scenes.description: A tense Senate chamber where mrcsschssr, in his imperial toga, is being stripped of his title as Emperor. He looks shocked and defiant as he's escorted out by a Senator, while the chamber is filled with chatter.

scenes.narration:
mrcsschssr wanders aimlessly, toga dragging through the dirt. CITIZENS whisper.
'NARRATOR: I went from ruling an empire to dodging stray dogs. What a life.'
mrcsschssr passes a tavern and pauses.
'mrcsschssr: Maybe wine will fix this.'
scenes.description: mrcsschssr, now in a worn and dirty toga, wanders through a bustling street. Citizens whisper as he passes by. He stops in front of a tavern, looking weary and contemplating whether to enter.

scenes.narration:
mrcsschssr drinks in a tavern, half-listening to Aurelia, a sculptor, at the next table.
'AURELIA: I want to carve something meaningful. Something real.'
mrcsschssr: 'Good luck with that. I tried ruling, and look where it got me.'
scenes.description: Inside a tavern, mrcsschssr sits drinking while Aurelia, a young sculptor, sketches at a nearby table. mrcsschssr looks slightly amused as he listens to Aurelia's passionate talk about her art.

scenes.narration:
mrcsschssr tries his hand at selling soup in the market. It's a mess, but CITIZENS gather, laughing and eating.
'NARRATOR: Turns out, people prefer soup over speeches. Who knew?' mrcsschssr ladles soup with a smile.
'mrcsschssr: Maybe I'm better at this.'
scenes.description: In a bustling market, mrcsschssr stands at a messy soup stall, awkwardly but cheerfully ladling out soup. Despite the chaos, citizens are gathered around, laughing and enjoying the food.

scenes.narration:
The SENATORS summon mrcsschssr back to the Senate chamber.
'SENATOR: We need you. As an advisor.' mrcsschssr grins, eyes twinkling.
'mrcsschssr: Soup's on, boys. Let's do this.'
scenes.description: Back in the Senate chamber, mrcsschssr stands confidently before the Senators. He looks bemused as they offer him a new role as an advisor, his eyes twinkling with newfound purpose.
